MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: However, the ring master asks where the proof that she was forcibly brought here is, and retreats to his tent. Kuang looks up at me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor, how can I help Saruhiko?
The other side seems to know what they're doing is shady, so we should simply take her back. They won't be able to say that the monkeys they took was just taken from them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Got it. Then let's go help Saruhiko as soon as possible...

Wait, Kuang. We can't make a scene in the middle of the day.
Let's wait until nightfall to make the rescue.
Kuang nods vigorously as she speaks.

The anxious look on Kuang's face is nowhere to be seen
as she turns around after shouting that.

Not long after that, the documents I wanted are delivered. The documents are full of information that we wanted to know, such as the number of circuses in the country and the schedule of their performances, not to mention sightings of monkeys.
She worked hard to stay awake when the other monkeys were sleeping, and even cared about Kuang, so she might indeed have the makings of a ring master.
They are the original Flamarine circus, but the circus that came after them became very popular because of their money, and they lost their customers. He says not to get in their way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Saruhiko must be feeling lonely in the cage.
Now I have to help him out of that loneliness.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Got it. Saruhiko, wait for me!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
At that time, Saruhiko was the only one who came and slept with me
when I went to bed in the morning.
If you think about it from that aspect, it brings up a suspicious point.
On our way back to the city where the SSS is staying, Kuang has been silent and thinking about something for a long time. Now, she seems to have come to a conclusion on what she should do.

When the ring master hears what Kuang says, he shows a hint of surprise,
wondering how she knew the monkey's favorite food is high quality melon.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: See, you just said there's a monkey.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I thought all the monkeys would be happy
if Saruhiko became the boss of the pack. And yet...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Saruhiko's dream is to be the boss of the pack, so she has to take care of her friends. It was warm when I squeezed her to sleep...

Kuang turns her head and clenches her fists,
as if blaming herself for not finding a clue about her precious friend.

Don't worry, Kuang. I've been making some moves here.
We should get a notice soon.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Notice...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Saruhiko, can you hear me? It's Kuang!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's Saruhiko! I knew she was here!
Wasn't that the sound of a monkey...?
When Kuang points this out, the ring master tries to keep his mouth shut. As the exchange continues, a sharp cry of an animal can be heard echoing from behind the tent.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's a lie, because it smells like Saruhiko.

The ring master of the circus said that there are no monkeys in their circus
when I called to confirm the truth.
Someone brought a monkey here? I don't understand it at all.
The next day, we go to the circus we had spotted and found it to be far more rundown and desolate looking than the circus where we had seen the show.
Kuang looks up and the sparkle returns to her eyes. But she can thank me after we find Saruhiko. Tomorrow, we'll go searching for her as soon as possible.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor...! Thank you!
The ring master of the group, who was speaking so much, hurriedly stops talking. As expected, he seems to understand that his lie has been exposed, and now he starts to get furious.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Look, Saruhiko is here!
He says he won't work anymore if you don't feed him some fine melons.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But you can't forcefully bring people here.
Kuang starts to talk in bursts, trying not to cry.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I was a little sad that I couldn't be with my mom,
but I didn't mind at all when I was eating and playing with the monkeys.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
But I had to work at the lighthouse at night,
so I couldn't just go to bed with everyone.
You were lonely, but not alone?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
A long time ago, I had to spend some time away from my mom,
and I was lonely...but I wasn't alone.

Kuang shouts into the tent,
and the monkey cries echo again from inside.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Saruhiko is someone I've been friends with since I was young.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Because the monkeys were there for me.
In the evening, a battered and bruised Kuang returns to the inn. I thought she might be able to find traces of the monkey's presence and track her down, but it didn't seem to work out that way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I couldn't find her...
And with that, she leaves the inn.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I have to find Saruhiko while I still can in Flamarine.
